name: Negating Cube
description: Users of the Strange Cube tend to think of many ways to negate unnecessary requirements.

weaponEffects.title: Flame Reaction
weaponEffects.description: Increase flame ATK by **20%** and flame resistance by **40%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Flame Resonance or Flame Reaction effects, with Flame Resonance taking precedence.

weaponEffects.title: Flame Benediction
weaponEffects.description: Increase entire team's flame ATK by **5%** when Benediction Resonance is activated.

normals.name: Normal Attack
normals.description:
While on the ground, manipulate the cube to attack **5** times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **56%** of ATK plus **336**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **45.8%** of ATK plus **275**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **142.2%** of ATK plus **854**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **95.5%** of ATK plus **574**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **97.1%** of ATK plus **582** up to **3** times and **launch** the target.
**Passive: If normal attacks hit targets **6** times, gain **1** cube. Up to **5** cubes can be stored.**

normals.name: Omnium Missile
normals.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to activate the energy within the cube, firing up to **5** missiles and dealing total damage equal to **71.2%** of ATK plus **427**. Consume up to **250** endurance.
**Passive: If the Wanderer has any stored cubes, consume all cubes to fire Omnium Missiles at targets to deal damage.**

normals.name: Energy Overflow
normals.description:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to trigger Energy Overflow.
Upon landing, fire a shockwave that travels forward, dealing up to **28.1%** of ATK plus **168** damage to targets in its path.

normals.name: Omnium Shock
normals.description:
On the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger Omnium Shock.
A pillar of energy launches nearby targets into the air, dealing damage equal to **82.1%** of ATK plus **492**. The pillar lasts **5** seconds and deals damage equal to **34.2%** of ATK plus **205** to nearby targets every second.

normals.name: Energy Sentinel
normals.description: Cubes orbiting the Wanderer deal damage equal to **11.6%** of ATK plus **70** to enemies.

normals.name: Energy Missile
normals.description: When the Wanderer casts Omnium Missiles and Energy Overflow, their orbiting cubes are fired as well, dealing damage equal to **48.5%** of ATK plus **291** to the target.

dodge.name: Soul Surge
dodge.description:
Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.
If the Wanderer has less than **5** cubes, each successful dodge has a **40%** chance to restore **1** dodge attempt.
Successful dodges do not interrupt normal attack combos.
**Passive: Gain a cube for every successful aerial dodge.**

skill.name: Omnium Shield
skill.description: Create shielding for self and nearby allies to block up to **800%** of ATK in damage for **10** seconds, deal **142.9%** of ATK plus **857** damage to nearby targets and **strongly launch** them. Each cube in possession when this skill is used adds **160%** of ATK to max shielding and exhaust the cube. Cooldown: **60** seconds.

discharge.name: Omnium Wave
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and gain **5** cubes, then unleash the **5** cubes along with a Shockwave. This Shockwave deals damage equal to **171%** of ATK plus **1026** to nearby targets, and **strongly launches** them into the air. Each cube also deals damage equal to **48.5%** of ATK plus **291**. If allies are in the vicinity, the allies and the wielder gain damage immunity for **3** seconds.

advancements.description: Deal damage and produce a healing orb which lasts for **20** seconds and restores the HP of any teammate who picks it up. The HP restored is equal to **60%** of ATK. **2**-second cooldown.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.
Reduce skill cooldown from **60** seconds to **30** seconds. Restore HP equal to **30%** of ATK every second while the shield is active.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **32%**.

Damaging a target also produces a damage orb, which lasts for **20** seconds and increases all damage and healing of any teammate who picks it up by **2%** for **30** seconds. Stack up to **10** times. Skill cooldown is **2.5** seconds.
Using a Skill grants allies healing orbs and damage orbs equal to the number of Omnium Cubes.
